ingredients.item: handful fresh mint, leaves finely chopped, plus extra to serve
1 lime, zest and juice of ½

instructions.step: Mix together the yogurt and crab meat, then fold through the carrots, red pepper, mint and lime zest and juice; season.

Arrange the lettuce leaves on plates and top each with some of the crab mixture and a sprinkling of mango. Scatter over the extra chopped mint. Serve with the remaining ½ lime, cut into slices, and wild rice, if liked
